channel.title: Need help :(
channel.description:
I need helping on changing the defender emote from shield to the normal emote
I got the emote ID for the defender but idk how to change shield emote to the defender but
keep the shield and defender separate emotes / gfx
If you could help I would appreciate it.
~~Aaron~~
